name: Memories (itch) (Manupa DogFlau)
description:
Memories Play as a old man remembering his life through a series of minigames. Controls: House: 

W and S for walking

Space for selecting

Bug game: 

Click the bugs

Jukebox:

Arrows for each note

Cooking Game:

A and D for controlling the pot

Made by: UAM's Videogame Association

Manuel Pablo González: Lead Programmer

Violeta Tejera: Programmer

Miguel Font: Programmer

Jaime Jódar: Music & Art

Daniel Guerrero: Script

With Polygon assets from https://syntystore.com/
